titles.title: Portable Benefits for Independent Workers Pilot Program Act
Portable Benefits for Independent Workers Pilot Program Act
A bill to require the Secretary of Labor to establish a pilot program for providing portable benefits to eligible workers, and for other purposes.
Portable Benefits for Independent Workers Pilot Program Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
